## placeTile() function

Create a function that places a tile on a board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function placeTile(tileId: TileId, coordinate: HexCoordinate): (board: GameBoard) => GameBoard;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

tileId


</td><td>

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md)


</td><td>

The tile that the returned function will place.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate where the returned function will place the tile.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

(board: [GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)

A function that takes a game board as a parameter; when called, the function will place `tileId` at `coordinate` on the board.
